settings.section_subtitle: Our core instructional team brings unparalleled expertise to every course.

settings.name: Dr. Sarah Mitchell, P.E.
settings.title: Lead Safety Engineering Instructor
settings.bio: With over 20 years in amusement ride engineering and safety analysis, Dr. Mitchell leads our mechanical systems and safety analysis courses. She holds Professional Engineer licenses in three states and has consulted on major theme park projects worldwide.
settings.credentials: Ph.D. Mechanical Engineering, P.E. Licensed, ASTM F24 Committee Member

settings.name: James Rodriguez
settings.title: Operations & Maintenance Director
settings.bio: Former Operations Director at three major theme parks, James brings real-world operational expertise to our management and maintenance courses. His hands-on approach helps students understand the practical challenges of daily operations.
settings.credentials: 25+ Years Operations Experience, IAAPA Certified, Former Disney Operations

settings.name: Maria Chen, J.D.
settings.title: Regulatory Compliance Specialist
settings.bio: An attorney specializing in amusement industry law and regulations, Maria ensures our courses cover the latest legal requirements and compliance standards. She regularly represents operators in regulatory matters.
settings.credentials: J.D. Law Degree, Amusement Industry Legal Specialist, 15+ Years Regulatory Experience

settings.name: David Thompson
settings.title: Inspection & Quality Assurance Expert
settings.bio: A certified inspector with experience at over 200 facilities, David teaches our inspection methodology and quality assurance courses. His systematic approach helps students develop thorough inspection skills.
settings.credentials: NAARSO Certified Inspector, 18+ Years Inspection Experience, 500+ Facilities Inspected

settings.section_subtitle: Regular guest lectures from leading industry professionals and subject matter experts.
settings.content_body:
AAI regularly features guest instructors from major theme parks, manufacturers, regulatory agencies, and consulting firms. These industry leaders share current trends, real-world case studies, and emerging technologies that keep our curriculum at the forefront of industry developments.

Recent Guest Instructors Include:

  • Walt Disney World - Senior Operations Managers
  • Universal Studios - Safety Directors
  • Six Flags - Maintenance Supervisors
  • Cedar Fair - Training Coordinators
  • Intamin AG - Design Engineers
  • B&M Coasters - Project Managers
  • State Regulatory Agencies - Chief Inspectors
  • Insurance Companies - Risk Assessment Specialists
